scripts.test: rollup -i src/mainSpec.js -o dist/bundle-tests.js && babel dist/bundle-tests.js --out-file dist/bundle-tests-es5.js
scripts.dev: watch 'npm run test && npm run devjs' ./src
scripts.devjs: rollup -c -o dist/bundle.js && babel dist/bundle.js | indexhtmlify --title js13kgame --style src/main.css > dist/index.html
scripts.build: rollup -c -o dist/bundle.js && babel dist/bundle.js | uglifyjs -cm | indexhtmlify --title js13kgame --style src/main.css | html-minifier --minify-css > dist/index.html
scripts.deploy:
npm run build && npm run release && gh-pages -d ./dist -m "Size: $(find ./dist -maxdepth 1 -printf '%s	%f
' | grep game.gz | grep -Po '[0-9]+')"
